infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Artemis needs access to your Health data to provide personalized fitness insights, track your activity, sleep, heart rate, and help calculate your fitness age.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Artemis would like to update your Health data.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Artemis needs your location to show nearby workout partners and help you organize group fitness sessions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Artemis needs your location to show nearby workout partners and help you organize group fitness sessions.

plugins.healthSharePermission: Artemis needs access to your Health data to provide personalized fitness insights, track your activity, sleep, heart rate, and help calculate your fitness age.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: Artemis would like to update your Health data.
